nodes.documentation:
@title OwnedProxy
@dev This contract combines an upgradeability proxy with basic authorization control functionalities
nodes.name: OwnedProxy
ProxyOwnershipTransferred

nodes.documentation: @dev Throws if called by any account other than the owner.
nodes.name: ifOwner

nodes.documentation: @dev the constructor sets the original owner of the contract to the sender account.

@dev Tells the address of the owner
@return the address of the owner
nodes.name: _owner

nodes.documentation: @dev Sets the address of the owner
nodes.name: _setOwner

nodes.documentation: @notice Internal function to provide the address of the implementation contract
nodes.name: _implementation

nodes.documentation:
@dev Tells the address of the proxy owner
@return the address of the proxy owner
nodes.name: proxyOwner

nodes.documentation:
@dev Tells the address of the current implementation
@return address of the current implementation
nodes.name: implementation

nodes.documentation:
@dev Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.
@param _newOwner The address to transfer ownership to.
nodes.name: transferProxyOwnership
